destination.name: Maasai Mara National Reserve
destination.description: Famous for its exceptional population of lions,leopards and cheetahs.Offers breathtaking views of the savannah.

destination.name: Diani Beach
destination.description: Known for its white sandy beaches and crystal-clear waters.Ideal for relaxation and water sports activities.

destination.name: Mount Kenya
destination.description: Africa's second-highest peak,offering trekking and climbing opportunities.Home to diverse wildlife and flora.

tours.name: Maasai Mara Safari
tours.description: Experience the wonders of Maasai Mara with daily game drives and cultural tours.Witness the Big Five and experience the rich Maasai culture.

tours.name: Diani Beach Getaway
tours.description: Indulge in ultimate relaxation at the beautiful Diani Beach.Enjoy water sports,sunbathing and spa treatments.

tours.name: Summit Expendition
tours.description: Embark on a challenging trek to the summit of Mount Kenya with experienced guides.Experience breathtaking views and diverse wildlife.
